org.apache.poi.xwpf.usermodel

Class TextSegment

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.poi.xwpf.usermodel.TextSegment

  • public class TextSegment
extends java.lang.Object
    saves the begin and end position of a text in a Paragraph
